package.description:
Download-based ROS installer for the Python Cryptography Toolkit (http://www.amk.ca/files/python/crypto/).
The Toolkit is a collection of cryptographic algorithms and protocols, implemented for use from Python.
This toolkit is a dependency for the Paramiko SSH library.
NOTE: pycrypto requires python-dev to build.
package.author: A.M. Kuchling/www.amk.ca. ROS package maintained by Ken Conley (kwc@willowgarage.com)
